projects.name: GNN Accelerated Phase Field Simulation
projects.summary: Phase field simulation on the grain growth of polycrystal samples under beam-laser additive manufacturing. GNN is used in the cunstruction of polycrystal meshed to accelerate the simulation.

projects.name: High-throughput Screening of O-PCMs
projects.summary: High-throughput characterization methods is used on combinatorial synthesized O-PCMs thin films to construct composition-structure-properties relations of the material.

projects.name: Electron Conductivity of LLZTO
projects.summary: LLZTO is a promising solid electrolyte for solid-state lithium-ion batteries. A symmetric Hebb-Wagner polarization method is presented to measure the electron conductivity of LLZTO.

publications.name: High-throughput screening of high energy density LiMn1-xFexPO4 via active learning
publications.summary: An high-throughput workflow was used for quantitatively predicting the Fe/Mn ratio and the energy density mapping of LMFP, revealing nonlinear relationships between the Fe/Mn ratio and electrochemical properties, elucidating the quantitative chemical composition-energy density map of LMFP. My contribution includes writing and editing.
